title: Crazy high ping!!!!!! (PLEASE HELP)
body:
Ok so September 18th i log in to play league of legends Summoner name "Cozmix" my ping is usually 34 solid about with 
60fps (i cap it at that) but when i went on today played a game and my ping is crazy from 350 to 1000 ms i have no idea why


please anything to help would be great, just want to play the game...

replies.body: It sounds like this is pretty out of the ordinary, and Steve might be onto something with the fact that it could be an issue stemming from your ISP's side of things. Let's take a look at what that connection looked like on its way to our servers by having our [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) scan your latest network logs. Grab a screenshot to post here of what it says so I can take a look with you.

i dont know how to post a picture on this...


but my results were:   My ISP score (97)      My connection score (96)

Alrighty, that seems pretty good. If you're still getting these crazy spikes try running through this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to cover some basic troubleshooting just in case some of those network settings aren't configured properly.
thanks lots for your help... gonna check out if there is anything wrong... thanks again!
ok ill go check it out

There could be something going on with your ISP, wait a while, and see if your ping lowers. If it doesn't, try restarting your router and see if that reduces your ping. If this doesn't work, you will most likely need to contact your ISP and see if anything is going on.
